name: AFROPUNK - Essential Stack Logo T  "Black On Black"
description:
Nonconforming and Redefining

For 10 Years AFROPUNK has served as a platform for the cultivation of urban culture inspired by alternative and experimental music.

Started with the 2003 documentary spotlighting a Black presence in the American punk scene, we retain a commitment to radical thought, DIY aesthetics, and diversity across sociopolitical identities.

name: AFROPUNK - Essential Stack Logo T  "Berry"
description:
Nonconforming and Redefining

For 10 Years AFROPUNK has served as a platform for the cultivation of urban culture inspired by alternative and experimental music.

Started with the 2003 documentary spotlighting a Black presence in the American punk scene, we retain a commitment to radical thought, DIY aesthetics, and diversity across sociopolitical identities.

In giving you this item we challenge you to question society--to speak out or protest when necessary.

In giving you this item we ask for your support of the arts, of education, and of freedom of expression and thought.

In giving you this item we welcome you to the movement.

name: 'Afro-punk' Movie DVD - Special Offer!
description:
The movie that sparked the movement. Features exclusive interviews with members of Dead Kennedys, Fishbone, TV On The Radio, The Eternals and many more + never before seen footage of Bad Brains!

Special Offer! For a limited time, get the DVD for $10 + shipping!

Visit http://www.afropunk.com/page/afropunk-the-movie to find out more about the film!
